title: Windows 8.0 AIO x86 18in1 en-US DaRT8SP1 Pre-Activated Sep2013
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 8 AIO 18in1 x86 en-US DaRT8 Sep2013
Contains KB files to bring setup current to Sep9-2013 patch date

No Windows 8 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

32-bit MSDN Sources:
en_windows_8_enterprise_n_x86_dvd_918707.iso
en_windows_8_enterprise_x86_dvd_917587.iso
en_windows_8_n_x86_dvd_916097.iso
en_windows_8_pro_n_vl_x86_dvd_918877.iso
en_windows_8_pro_vl_x86_dvd_917830.iso
en_windows_8_x86_dvd_915417.iso

These RTM Sources are the final Build 9200

Installation Indexes:
Windows 8 (Core) 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 (Core) N 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 ProWMC 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro N 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro VL 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro N VL 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Enterprise 32-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Enterprise N 32-bit KMS-Activated

(Core) and ProWMC versions of KMS Activation are not
officially supported by Microsoft, so use them at your
own risk. They default to 30-day activation instead of
the normal 180-day period. All KMS-Activated Indexes
will auto-renew indefinitely as long as you do not
install any kb file that blocks the service or if you
install a security program without allowing the
activation traffic and program through the firewall.

Release File: Win8AIO-18in1-x86-en-US-Sep2013.iso
Size: 2.76GiB
SHA-1: 520B5E968529BC2849DD9D65BDE00E4DBE4B2DD5

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
Microsoft DaRT8 SP1 (thx anarchist9027)
imagex for renaming and prowmc index flag
dism for MSU KB integration, mount for file copying, export to esd
oscdimg for ISO mastering

setupcomplete.cmd phase:
KB2772501 (online only IEPropSchema update)
KB2871777 (Servicing Stack Update)
SC Config and SC Create (KMS-Activated index)
Reboot for Servicing Stack configuration completion

Features:
-Non-Activated indexes and KMS-Activated indexes
KMS-Activated indexes will Activate before first logon and
renew activation every 7 days.
-Recent Windows Updates included for extra security
-Included notes from my KMS-SS for Office activation
and other information. You do not need to read to use.
-MS DaRT8 SP1 integrated into "Repair this computer" boot option
-Install.esd using recovery compression for smaller ISO

Changes from recent Windows 8 AIO releases:
-Using new Install.esd Recovery compression from 8.1 ADK.
Results in much smaller releases and hence less seeding issues.

Notes:
-The KMS Activator in this is for v5, it will not work if you try
to upgrade to Windows 8.1 because 8.1 uses v6.

Credits:
anarchist9027 - MS DaRT8 SP1 boot.wim integration help
CODYQX4 - KMS Server Service (Activator)
murphy78 - Integration, testing, and ISO design

Enjoy Pirates,
murphy78-TPB/MDL :)
